example_en: He looks sad after the news.
example_ka: ის სევდიანად გამოიყურება ახალი ამბის შემდეგ.

example_en: The children are excited about the trip.
Her parents are proud of her.
She felt lonely in the new city.
He was disappointed with the result.
She was surprised by the gift.
He felt embarrassed in front of everyone.
He gets frustrated with slow internet.
I'm relieved the exam is over.
She was ashamed of her behavior.
She was furious when she found out.
He's too lazy to clean his room.
She's too shy to speak in public.
Don't be selfish, share with others.
He's too stubborn to change his mind.
Despite his success, he remains humble.
She was sympathetic to his problems.

example_ka: ის თავგადასავლის მოყვარეა და მოგზაურობა უყვარს.

example_en: The child is scared of the dark.
I feel homesick when I travel.
I was amazed by the view.
He feels insecure about his looks.
I feel relaxed after the vacation.
She's envious of her sister's success.
example_ka: ის და შეშურება თავისი ძმის წარმატება.

example_en: He felt melancholy on rainy days.
He seems indifferent to the outcome.
The lake looked serene at sunset.
He felt bitter after the betrayal.
She was horrified by the accident.
He was devastated by the loss.
I was mortified by my mistake.
Citizens were outraged by the decision.
She felt vulnerable after the divorce.
He became withdrawn after the trauma.
She's very spontaneous with her decisions.
His impulsive nature got him in trouble.
Don't be passive in your career.
Being a perfectionist can be stressful.
Don't be a procrastinator with homework.
Children are dependent on their parents.
It's hypocritical to say one thing and do another.
example_ka: ფარისევლურია ერთის თქმა და მეორის კეთება.

example_en: He's always grumpy in the morning.
It's inconsiderate to be loud at night.
I have sympathy for your loss.
She showed compassion to the homeless.

example_ka: სიძულვილი მხოლოდ უფრო მეტ ტკივილს მოაქვს.

example_en: Parents show affection to their children.
I have great admiration for her work.
He showed contempt for the rules.
She felt resentment after the betrayal.
The movie filled me with terror.
The king's wrath was feared by all.

example_ka: ქორწინებამ მას სუფთა ღვთაებრივი სიხარული მოუტანა.

example_en: Grief is a natural response to loss.
Autumn brings a sense of melancholy.
She felt longing for her homeland.
His yearning for freedom grew stronger.

example_ka: უარყოფა ტკივილს იწვევს, მაგრამ გაკვეთილებს სწავლობს.

example_en: Shame prevented him from asking for help.
Guilt weighed heavily on her conscience.
I have no regret about my decision.
example_ka: ჩემი გადაწყვეტილების გამო სინანული არ მაქვს.

example_en: Pride can be both good and bad.
example_ka: ამაყობა შეიძლება იყოს როგორც კარგი, ისე ცუდი.

example_en: Vanity blinds us to our faults.
She felt apprehension before the exam.
I dread going to the dentist.
